data.name: Stranded Nightmare
data.detailed_description:
As a stranded sailor you find yourself on an Island with strange occurrences.
Try to survive in an dynamic environment consisting of beautiful nature, bunker systems and terrifying experimental science facilities, against humanoid
creatures.
Can you find a way to escape and solve the mystery of this Island?

An inventory system with multiple melee weapons and key items help you to defend yourself and conquer the challenges.
The scary and thrilling atmosphere guarantees an exciting and entertaining experience.

Pick up the pieces and gather information from notes of disappeard military personnel and scientists.
Explore the big Island and its hidden underground world!

Use your flashlight to navigate through the jungle when the sun is down. There might be something in the darkness, be careful!
data.about_the_game:
As a stranded sailor you find yourself on an Island with strange occurrences.
Try to survive in an dynamic environment consisting of beautiful nature, bunker systems and terrifying experimental science facilities, against humanoid

Can you find a way to escape and solve the mystery of this Island?

An inventory system with multiple melee weapons and key items help you to defend yourself and conquer the challenges.
The scary and thrilling atmosphere guarantees an exciting and entertaining experience.

Pick up the pieces and gather information from notes of disappeard military personnel and scientists.

Use your flashlight to navigate through the jungle when the sun is down. There might be something in the darkness, be careful!
data.short_description: In this Indie Horror Game you are playing as a stranded Sailor who tries to find a way to escape the Island. But there are some strange things going on! Created with Unreal Engine 5, this game offers a thrilling horror experience with good graphics and combat action! Let's see how brave you are.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Occasional Violence and Scary Sound Effects
